Uses of Package
com.beowulfe.hap

  • Packages that use com.beowulfe.hap 
    Package Description
    com.beowulfe.hap
    Base package for implementing the Homekit Accessory Protocol.
    com.beowulfe.hap.accessories
    Contains interfaces that can be implemented to represent an exposed accessory.
    com.beowulfe.hap.accessories.thermostat  
    com.beowulfe.hap.characteristics
    Contains the basic characteristic types that can be supplied over the Homekit Accessory Protocol.
  • Classes in com.beowulfe.hap used by com.beowulfe.hap 
    Class and Description
    HomekitAccessory
    Base interface for all Homekit Accessories.
    HomekitAuthInfo
    Authentication info that must be provided when constructing a new HomekitServer.
    HomekitRoot
    Provides advertising and handling for Homekit accessories.
    HomekitStandaloneAccessoryServer
    A server for exposing standalone Homekit accessory (as opposed to a Bridge accessory which contains multiple accessories).
    Service
    Interface for a Service offered by an accessory.
  • Classes in com.beowulfe.hap used by com.beowulfe.hap.accessories 
    Class and Description
    HomekitAccessory
    Base interface for all Homekit Accessories.
    HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback
    A callback interface for notifying subscribers that a characteristic value has changed.
    Service
    Interface for a Service offered by an accessory.
  • Classes in com.beowulfe.hap used by com.beowulfe.hap.accessories.thermostat 
    Class and Description
    HomekitAccessory
    Base interface for all Homekit Accessories.
    HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback
    A callback interface for notifying subscribers that a characteristic value has changed.
    Service
    Interface for a Service offered by an accessory.
  • Classes in com.beowulfe.hap used by com.beowulfe.hap.characteristics 
    Class and Description
    HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback
    A callback interface for notifying subscribers that a characteristic value has changed.
